Name: neonatal myasthenia gravis
Definition: A bipolar disorder that is characterized by at least one manic or mixed episode.

Name: obsolete rheumatic pericarditis
Definition: A bipolar disorder that is characterized by at least one manic or mixed episode.

Name: obsolete syndrome of infant of a diabetic mother
Definition: A bipolar disorder that is characterized by at least one manic or mixed episode.
Synonym: syndrome of infant of diabetic mother (disorder)
